  The f5distributedcloud_discovery resource manages Discovery configurations in F5 Distributed Cloud.
  Discovery enables automatic detection of services running in Kubernetes clusters or other environments connected to F5 XC.
  Example Usage
  
  resource "f5distributedcloud_discovery" "k8s_discovery" {
    name           = "k8s-discovery"
    namespace      = "my-namespace"
    discovery_type = "K8S"
    cluster_name   = "my-k8s-cluster"

      disable_publish = false
      dns_domain      = "services.example.com"

    name             = "vsite-discovery"

# f5distributedcloud_discovery (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_discovery` resource manages Discovery configurations in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Discovery enables automatic detection of services running in Kubernetes clusters or other environments connected to F5 XC.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_discovery" "k8s_discovery" {
  name           = "k8s-discovery"
  namespace      = "my-namespace"
  discovery_type = "K8S"
  cluster_name   = "my-k8s-cluster"

  publish_info {
    disable_publish = false
    dns_domain      = "services.example.com"
  }
}
```

## Virtual Site Discovery

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_discovery" "vsite_discovery" {
  name             = "vsite-discovery"
  namespace        = "my-namespace"
  discovery_type   = "VIRTUAL_SITE"
  virtual_site_ref = "my-virtual-site"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `discovery_type` (String) Type of discovery to perform.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `cluster_name` (String) Name of the Kubernetes cluster for K8S discovery.
- `description` (String)
- `kube_config` (String, Sensitive) Kubernetes configuration for cluster access.
- `publish_info` (Block, Optional) Service publishing configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--publish_info))
- `virtual_site_ref` (String) Reference to virtual site for VIRTUAL_SITE discovery type.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--publish_info"></a>
### Nested Schema for `publish_info`

Optional:

- `disable_publish` (Boolean) Disable automatic service publishing.
- `dns_domain` (String) DNS domain for discovered services.
